Actions.Text: -- Requires Keyboard Maestro 8.0.3+set kmInst to system attribute "KMINSTANCE"tell application "Keyboard Maestro Engine"	set kmPath to getvariable "local__Path" instance kmInstend tell-- Expand tilde (~) Pathstell application "System Events"	set thePP_Path to POSIX path of disk item kmPathend tell-- Convert POSIX path to Macintosh path (path delimited with colons)set theA_Path to POSIX file thePP_Path as stringtry	tell application "Finder"		set newWin to make new Finder window		tell newWin			set its target to theA_Path			if toolbar visible ‚â† true then set toolbar visible to true			if its current view ‚â† list view then set its current view to list view		end tell	end tell	return 1on error	return 0end try
